labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The first role goes back to its original position down.
data.expected_result: The first role should remain in its position up
data.short_description: Creating a new role, then moving it up and making another role causes the first role to go back to its original position
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new role - Move its position up - Create another role
